name: Video Poker World Tour
summary: Video Poker World Tour is the first game of Poker where you can visit different countries and participate in major Video Poker tournaments of the world: Italy, UK, China, Japan, Argentina, Mexico, etc. Travel around the world and play the final in Las Vegas. The game is divided into 4 zones. Each zone has 4 levels with Video Poker machines with different graphic setting and a Grand Casino. Each machine includes a fun mini-game based on the Double or Nothing concept. Are you ready to beat all the levels and complete the game?
